column5: On May 27 there was a theft from The Bait Bucket in Barrie. On the facebook page are videos and stills of the three suspects: https://www.facebook.com/thebaitbucketbarrie
don't recognize them but sure hope they get caught
ttt  Never know who might see this.
very clean video of two of the dudes. scumbags

It seems two of them have been named. Although one is called by his street name.  Tom was lucky if you ask me. There  a time in the video, where if he had noticed the theft, the other two guys could of jumped him easy.  Total B,,S  when stuff like this happens.
They need to have their fingers smashed with 10 lb sledge hammers.

Wow how much stuff did they get? I seen the one dude had 2 back packs on..Man my wife works at Shoppers drug mart.The thieft is unreal..Most done by professional thief's .These guys were likely pros and Long gone..
It appears the two that stole items from the store, have been caught and charged.
....and soon will get off scot-free with probation I bet
Im betting they have prior records and that would come into play.  What are they charged with? Theft under $5000?
